WorkItem.ClosedComment: Old Hunter is now gone and HunterSE is active as Hunter
WorkItem.Description:
Still a big difference. The calculated dps now reacts to changes to the piercing talent. But the difference is still large.
Attaching character file I use for comparison.

Comments.Message:
Hunter/HunterSE

Ranged AP:          8334 / 9067
Pet AP:                 4639 / 5045
AutoShot DPS:     2130 / 2220
Aimed Shot (Rotation DPS) :   794   /   644
Serpent Sting :                      501   /   307
Steady:                                 1885  /  653
Killshot:                                 317   / 341
Chimera:                                1582  /  811

Last commit made the differences smaller but they are still evident, especially Steady Shot and Chimera Shots.

Unfortunately, I don't see where the issue lies.
- Steady: The frequency is dropping significantly but the code is roughly the same.
- Chimera: The Damage is about half what was in Hunter, which is where the big drop occurs, but the code is roughly the same.

Anyone have a WWS log I can see for a MM to see if I'm just correcting a mistake in Hunter or if Hunter was right and HunterSE is wrong?

I think I found the last of the major issues:
